name: Minejank
description:
(FULLSCREEN if ur playing the web version)

Ever wondered what Minecraft would be like if it was made in a week by someone in the middle of moving out of his old apartment AND there was a janky, anti-gravity dirt hemisphere with physics that you could potentially build and babysit?
No?
Well too bad, because that's what this more-or-less turned into.

NOTE: the game will be laggy for a few hot seconds when first playing because of procedural loading 'n' stuff.

Controls:
- WASDs to move.

- Left mouse to mine/interact with weird cube crystals

- right mouse to place blocks. 

- space to jump (you get free infinite air jumps), 

Credits:

- Graphics + Programming: Mr. Thee

- Audio: ram1ta (https://ram1ta.itch.io/)
